name: Travis Scott Air Jordan 4 Retro Purple Suede
description: The sneaker is dressed in purple suede with black grid mesh, matte lace wings and semi-transparent eyestays.

name: Nike Sb Dunk Low Freddy
description: The Nike SB Dunk Low Freddy draws inspiration from Freddy Krueger's distinct and nightmarish appearance, particularly his striped sweater and gruesome character.

name: Nike Back To The Future 89
description: One of the most distinctive and iconic features of the Nike Mag is its self-lacing technology. The shoes are equipped with an automatic lacing system that tightens the laces
